mapper.select: select sy01.csy011, sy02.* from sy02 sy02, sy01 sy01 where csy023 = 0 and sy01.csy010 = sy02.csy010 order by sy02.csy010
mapper.insert: insert into sy02 (CSY010, CSY021, CSY022, CSY023) values (#{csy010,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{csy021,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy022,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy023,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select sy02.csy010, sy02.csy021, sy02.csy022 from sy02 sy02 where sy02.csy023 = 0 and sy02.csy021 = #{csy021}
select sy02.* from sy02 where csy023 = 0 and csy021 = #{csy021}
select sy01.csy011, sy02.csy020 as orders, sy02.csy020, sy02.csy021 from sy02 sy02, sy01 sy01 where csy023 = 0 and sy01.csy010 = sy02.csy010 order by sy02.csy010
mapper.insert: insert into sy02 (CSY020, CSY010, CSY021, CSY022, CSY023) values (#{csy020,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{csy010,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{csy021,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy022,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy023,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into sy02
CSY020,
CSY010,
CSY021,
CSY022,
CSY023,
#{csy020,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{csy010,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{csy021,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{csy022,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{csy023,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mapper.update:
update sy02
CSY010 = #{csy010,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CSY021 = #{csy021,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSY022 = #{csy022,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSY023 = #{csy023,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where CSY020 = #{csy020,jdbcType=INTEGER}
